plugins.publishCmd: echo 'Publishing to NPM...' && pnpm publish --filter @snapkit/react --access public && pnpm publish --filter @snapkit/nextjs --access public && echo 'Publishing to GitHub Packages...' && NODE_AUTH_TOKEN=$GITHUB_TOKEN pnpm publish --filter @snapkit/react --registry https://npm.pkg.github.com --access public && NODE_AUTH_TOKEN=$GITHUB_TOKEN pnpm publish --filter @snapkit/nextjs --registry https://npm.pkg.github.com --access public
